column4: have you set up the key as a bootable drive? I know that's a dumb question, but best to start at the beginning. If so, and it won't boot, I would try mac forums
I sold my mac a couple of years ago and none of it is fresh in my mind.

i have.  i am a big linux nerd.  i have installed and booted many non mac machines with debian and ubuntu in my life.  i can't get it to work with a macbook pro.  everyone tells me to read install usb stick install howtos, thats not the issue
sorry, as I said, I no longer have one, otherwise I'd be happy to chip in some TS time.
